##############################
# Vivado Project Ignore File
# Safe for RTL, XDC, BD, IP, TCL
##############################

# Vivado auto-generated folders
*.Xil/
*.cache/
*.hw/
*.ip_user_files/
*.runs/
*.gen/
*.sim/
*.webtalk/
*.srcs/sources_1/ipshared/
*.srcs/sources_1/bd/*/hdl/
*.srcs/sources_1/bd/*/ip/

# Vivado project database files
*.jou
*.log
*.str
*.tcl.restore
*.html
*.xml
*.backup.jou
*.backup.log

# Implementation and synthesis outputs
*.dcp
*.bit
*.bin
*.mmi
*.pb
*.rpt
*.ltx
*.bmm
*.elf
*.map
*.mcs
*.ncd
*.prm

# IP-related generated products
*.sdk/
*.hdf
*.xml
*.json

# Checkpoints and temporary data
*.chk
*.tmp
*.temp
*.cache
*.crashdump

# Simulation outputs
*.wdb
*.vcd
*.saif

# IDE junk
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Python/utility script caches (if using scripts)
__pycache__/
*.pyc

##############################
# Files that SHOULD be tracked:
# - RTL (*.v, *.sv, *.vh, *.vhd)
# - XDC constraints (*.xdc)
# - .bd block design files
# - .xpr project file
# - Custom IP (inside manually created ip/ folder)
# - Scripts (*.tcl)
##############################
